patthana3.4:1.1.pli: Noāsavaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca noāsavo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.4:2.1.pli: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… kamme ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.4:4.1.pli: Āsavaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.4:5.1.pli: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.4:6.1.pli: Nahetuyā ekaṃ, naadhipatiyā nava …pe… nakamme tīṇi, navipāke nava, navippayutte nava. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.4:8.1.pli: Āsavo akusalo dhammo āsavassa akusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.

patthana3.4:9.1.pli: Hetuyā satta, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava (majjhe tiṇṇaṃ sahajātādhipati labbhati), anantare nava …pe… upanissaye nava, āsevane nava, kamme tīṇi …pe… jhāne tīṇi, magge nava …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.4:10.1.pli: Noāsavaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca noāsavo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.4:11.1.pli: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.4:14.1.pli: Sāsavaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sāsavo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana3.4:15.1.pli: Anāsavaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anāsavo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.4:16.1.pli: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā dve …pe… avigate dve. (Saṅkhittaṃ, anulomaṃ.)

patthana3.4:17.1.pli: Naadhipatiyā dve …pe… naāsevane ekaṃ …pe… navippayutte dve. (Saṅkhittaṃ. Paccanīyaṃ. Sahajātavārepi …pe… sampayuttavārepi sabbattha dve.)

patthana3.4:18.1.pli: Sāsavo kusalo dhammo sāsavassa kusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.

patthana3.4:19.1.pli: Anāsavo kusalo dhammo anāsavassa kusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.4:20.1.pli: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā tīṇi, anantare dve …pe… nissaye dve, upanissaye cattāri, āsevane dve …pe… avigate dve. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.4:21.1.pli: (Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṃ, evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)

patthana3.4:22.1.pli: Sāsavaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sāsavo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.4:23.1.pli: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.4:25.1.pli: Sāsavaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sāsavo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana3.4:26.1.pli: Anāsavaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anāsavo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Anāsavaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sāsavo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Anāsavaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sāsavo abyākato ca anāsavo abyākato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.

patthana3.4:27.1.pli: Sāsavaṃ abyākatañca anāsavaṃ abyākatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca sāsavo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.4:28.1.pli: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… āsevane ekaṃ …pe… vipāke pañca …pe… avigate pañca. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.4:29.1.pli: Nahetuyā ekaṃ, naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā dve, napurejāte cattāri, napacchājāte naāsevane pañca, nakamme …pe… namagge ekaṃ …pe… navippayutte dve …pe… novigate tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.4:31.1.pli: Sāsavo abyākato dhammo sāsavassa abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.

patthana3.4:32.1.pli: Anāsavo abyākato dhammo anāsavassa abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.4:33.1.pli: Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā anantare samanantare cattāri, sahajāte pañca, aññamaññe dve, nissaye satta, upanissaye cattāri, purejāte pacchājāte dve, āsevane ekaṃ, kamme …pe… magge cattāri, sampayutte dve, vippayutte tīṇi …pe… avigate satta. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.4:34.1.pli: (Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṃ, evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)

patthana3.4:36.1.pli: Āsavavippayuttaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavavippayutto kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.4:37.1.pli: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.4:39.1.pli: Āsavasampayuttaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavasampayutto akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana3.4:40.1.pli: Āsavavippayuttaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavasampayutto akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana3.4:41.1.pli: Āsavasampayuttaṃ akusalañca āsavavippayuttaṃ akusalañca dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavasampayutto akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.4:42.1.pli: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe pañca …pe… avigate pañca. (Saṅkhittaṃ. Sahajātavārepi …pe… sampayuttavārepi sabbattha pañca.)

patthana3.4:43.1.pli: Nahetuyā ekaṃ, naadhipatiyā pañca, napurejāte pañca …pe… nakamme tīṇi, navipāke pañca, navippayutte pañca. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.4:44.1.pli: Āsavasampayutto akusalo dhammo āsavasampayuttassa akusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.

patthana3.4:45.1.pli: Āsavavippayutto akusalo dhammo āsavasampayuttassa akusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.

patthana3.4:46.1.pli: Āsavasampayutto akusalo ca āsavavippayutto akusalo ca dhammā āsavasampayuttassa akusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.4:47.1.pli: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā ekaṃ, anantare samanantare nava, sahajāte aññamaññe nissaye pañca, upanissaye āsevane nava, kamme āhāre indriye jhāne magge tīṇi, sampayutte pañca …pe… avigate pañca. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.4:48.1.pli: (Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṃ, evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)

patthana3.4:49.1.pli: Āsavavippayuttaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavavippayutto abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.4:50.1.pli: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.4:51.1.pli: Nahetuyā ekaṃ, naārammaṇe ekaṃ, naadhipatiyā ekaṃ …pe… novigate ekaṃ. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.4:53.1.pli: Āsavavippayutto abyākato dhammo āsavavippayuttassa abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.4:54.1.pli: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.4:55.1.pli: (Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṃ, evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)

patthana3.4:57.1.pli: Sāsavañceva no ca āsavaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sāsavo ceva no ca āsavo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.4:58.1.pli: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.4:60.1.pli: Āsavañceva sāsavañca akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavo ceva sāsavo ca akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana3.4:61.1.pli: Sāsavañceva no ca āsavaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sāsavo ceva no ca āsavo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana3.4:62.1.pli: Āsavañceva sāsavañca akusalañca sāsavañceva no ca āsavaṃ akusalañca dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavo ceva sāsavo ca akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.4:63.1.pli: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.4:64.1.pli: Sāsavañceva no ca āsavaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavo ceva sāsavo ca akusalo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.4:65.1.pli: Nahetuyā ekaṃ, naadhipatiyā nava, napurejāte nava, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke nava, navippayutte nava. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.4:67.1.pli: Āsavo ceva sāsavoca akusalo dhammo āsavassa ceva sāsavassa ca akusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.4:68.1.pli: Hetuyā satta, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava …pe… upanissaye āsevane nava, kamme āhāre indriye jhāne tīṇi, magge sampayutte nava …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.4:69.1.pli: Āsavo ceva sāsavo ca akusalo dhammo āsavassa ceva sāsavassa ca akusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.4:73.1.pli: (Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṃ, evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)

patthana3.4:74.1.pli: Sāsavañceva no ca āsavaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sāsavo ceva no ca āsavo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.4:75.1.pli: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.4:78.1.pli: Āsavañceva āsavasampayuttañca akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavo ceva āsavasampayutto ca akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana3.4:79.1.pli: Āsavasampayuttañceva no ca āsavaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavasampayutto ceva no ca āsavo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana3.4:80.1.pli: Āsavañceva āsavasampayuttañca akusalañca āsavasampayuttañceva no ca āsavaṃ akusalañca dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavo ceva āsavasampayutto ca akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.4:81.1.pli: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.4:82.1.pli: Āsavañceva āsavasampayuttañca akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavo ceva āsavasampayutto ca akusalo dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā.

patthana3.4:83.1.pli: Naadhipatiyā nava, napurejāte nava, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke nava, navippayutte nava. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.4:85.1.pli: Āsavo ceva āsavasampayutto ca akusalo dhammo āsavassa ceva āsavasampayuttassa ca akusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.4:86.1.pli: Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava …pe… upanissaye āsevane nava, kamme āhāre indriye jhāne tīṇi, magge sampayutte nava …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.4:90.1.pli: (Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṃ, evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)

patthana3.4:92.1.pli: Āsavavippayuttaṃ sāsavaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavavippayutto sāsavo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Āsavavippayuttaṃ anāsavaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavavippayutto anāsavo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.4:93.1.pli: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe dve …pe… avigate dve. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.4:95.1.pli: Āsavavippayuttaṃ sāsavaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavavippayutto sāsavo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana3.4:96.1.pli: Āsavavippayuttaṃ anāsavaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavavippayutto anāsavo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Āsavavippayuttaṃ anāsavaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavavippayutto sāsavo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Āsavavippayuttaṃ anāsavaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavavippayutto sāsavo abyākato ca āsavavippayutto anāsavo abyākato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.

patthana3.4:97.1.pli: Āsavavippayuttaṃ sāsavaṃ abyākatañca āsavavippayuttaṃ anāsavaṃ abyākatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavavippayutto sāsavo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.4:98.1.pli: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… āsevane ekaṃ, kamme pañca, vipāke pañca …pe… avigate pañca. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.4:99.1.pli: Āsavavippayuttaṃ sāsavaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavavippayutto sāsavo abyākato dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.4:100.1.pli: Nahetuyā ekaṃ, naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā dve …pe… napurejāte cattāri, napacchājāte naāsevane pañca, nakamme navipāke …pe… namagge ekaṃ …pe… navippayutte dve …pe… novigate tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.4:101.1.pli: (Sahajātavāropi paccayavāropi nissayavāropi saṃsaṭṭhavāropi sampayuttavāropi paṭiccavārasadisā vitthāretabbā.)

patthana3.4:102.1.pli: Āsavavippayutto sāsavo abyākato dhammo āsavavippayuttassa sāsavassa abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.

patthana3.4:103.1.pli: Āsavavippayutto anāsavo abyākato dhammo āsavavippayuttassa anāsavassa abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. Āsavavippayutto anāsavo abyākato dhammo āsavavippayuttassa sāsavassa abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. Āsavavippayutto anāsavo abyākato dhammo āsavavippayuttassa sāsavassa abyākatassa ca āsavavippayuttassa anāsavassa abyākatassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.

patthana3.4:104.1.pli: Āsavavippayutto sāsavo abyākato dhammo āsavavippayuttassa sāsavassa abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.

patthana3.4:105.1.pli: Āsavavippayutto anāsavo abyākato dhammo āsavavippayuttassa anāsavassa abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Āsavavippayutto anāsavo abyākato dhammo āsavavippayuttassa sāsavassa abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.4:106.1.pli: Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā cattāri, anantare cattāri, samanantare cattāri, sahajāte pañca, aññamaññe dve, nissaye satta, upanissaye cattāri, purejāte dve, āsevane ekaṃ, kamme cattāri, vipāke cattāri, āhāre cattāri …pe… sampayutte dve, vippayutte tīṇi …pe… avigate satta. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.4:107.1.pli: Āsavavippayutto sāsavo abyākato dhammo āsavavippayuttassa sāsavassa abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … purejātapaccayena paccayo … pacchājātapaccayena paccayo … āhārapaccayena paccayo … indriyapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.4:111.1.pli: (Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṃ, evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)

patthana3.5:1.1.pli: Nosaññojanaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nosaññojano kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.5:2.1.pli: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.5:4.1.pli: Saññojanaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saññojano akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Saññojanaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nosaññojano akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Saññojanaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saññojano akusalo ca nosaññojano akusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.5:5.1.pli: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.5:6.1.pli: Nahetuyā tīṇi, naadhipatiyā nava …pe… nakamme tīṇi …pe… navippayutte nava. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.5:8.1.pli: Saññojano akusalo dhammo saññojanassa akusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.5:9.1.pli: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava …pe… upanissaye āsevane nava, kamme tīṇi, āhāre indriye jhāne tīṇi, magge sampayutte nava …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.5:13.1.pli: (Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṃ, evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)

patthana3.5:14.1.pli: Nosaññojanaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nosaññojano abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.5:15.1.pli: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.5:17.1.pli: Saññojaniyaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saññojaniyo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana3.5:18.1.pli: Asaññojaniyaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca asaññojaniyo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.5:20.1.pli: (Yathā cūḷantaraduke lokiyadukagamanaṃ, evaṃ imampi ñātabbaṃ. Sahajātavāropi …pe… pañhāvāropi vitthāretabbā.)

patthana3.5:21.1.pli: Saññojaniyaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saññojaniyo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.5:22.1.pli: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.5:24.1.pli: Saññojaniyaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saññojaniyo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana3.5:25.1.pli: Asaññojaniyaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca asaññojaniyo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Asaññojaniyaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saññojaniyo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Asaññojaniyaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saññojaniyo abyākato ca asaññojaniyo abyākato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.

patthana3.5:26.1.pli: Saññojaniyaṃ abyākatañca asaññojaniyaṃ abyākatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca saññojaniyo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana3.5:27.1.pli: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… avigate pañca. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.5:29.1.pli: Saññojaniyo abyākato dhammo saññojaniyassa abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.

patthana3.5:30.1.pli: Asaññojaniyo abyākato dhammo asaññojaniyassa abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.5:31.1.pli: Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā cattāri …pe… avigate satta. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.5:32.1.pli: Saññojaniyo abyākato dhammo saññojaniyassa abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … purejātapaccayena paccayo … pacchājātapaccayena paccayo … āhārapaccayena paccayo … indriyapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.5:36.1.pli: (Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṃ, evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)

patthana3.5:37.1.pli: Saññojanavippayuttaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saññojanavippayutto kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.5:38.1.pli: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.5:40.1.pli: Saññojanasampayuttaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saññojanasampayutto akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana3.5:41.1.pli: Saññojanasampayuttaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saññojanasampayutto akusalo dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.5:42.1.pli: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe pañca, adhipatiyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate pañca. (Saṅkhittaṃ, anulomaṃ.)

patthana3.5:43.1.pli: Saññojanasampayuttaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saññojanasampayutto akusalo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—vicikicchāsahagate khandhe paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato moho. Saññojanasampayuttaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saññojanavippayutto akusalo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—uddhaccasahagate khandhe paṭicca uddhaccasahagato moho.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.5:44.1.pli: Nahetuyā dve, naadhipatiyā pañca, napurejāte pañca …pe… nakamme tīṇi …pe… navippayutte pañca. (Saṅkhittaṃ, paccanīyaṃ.)

patthana3.5:45.1.pli: Saññojanasampayutto akusalo dhammo saññojanasampayuttassa akusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.

patthana3.5:46.1.pli: Saññojanavippayutto akusalo dhammo saññojanasampayuttassa akusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.

patthana3.5:47.1.pli: Saññojanasampayutto akusalo dhammo saññojanasampayuttassa akusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … nava.

patthana3.5:48.1.pli: Saññojanasampayutto akusalo dhammo saññojanasampayuttassa akusalassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.5:49.1.pli: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā ekaṃ, anantare samanantare nava, sahajāte aññamaññe nissaye pañca, upanissaye āsevane nava, kamme tīṇi, āhāre indriye jhāne magge tīṇi, sampayutte pañca, atthiyā pañca …pe… avigate pañca. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.5:50.1.pli: Saññojanavippayuttaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saññojanavippayutto abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.5:51.1.pli: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.5:53.1.pli: Saññojaniyañceva no ca saññojanaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saññojaniyo ceva no ca saññojano kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.5:54.1.pli: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.5:56.1.pli: Saññojanañceva saññojaniyañca akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saññojano ceva saññojaniyo ca akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.5:57.1.pli: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.5:58.1.pli: Nahetuyā tīṇi, naadhipatiyā nava, napurejāte nava, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke nava, navippayutte nava. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.5:60.1.pli: Saññojano ceva saññojaniyo ca akusalo dhammo saññojanassa ceva saññojaniyassa ca akusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.5:61.1.pli: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava …pe… upanissaye āsevane nava, kamme āhāre indriye jhāne tīṇi, magge sampayutte nava …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.5:65.1.pli: (Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṃ, evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)

patthana3.5:66.1.pli: Saññojaniyañceva no ca saññojanaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saññojaniyo ceva no ca saññojano abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.5:67.1.pli: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.5:69.1.pli: Saññojanañceva saññojanasampayuttañca akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saññojano ceva saññojanasampayutto ca akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana3.5:70.1.pli: Saññojanasampayuttañceva no ca saññojanaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saññojanasampayutto ceva no ca saññojano akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana3.5:71.1.pli: Saññojanañceva saññojanasampayuttaṃ akusalañca saññojanasampayuttañceva no ca saññojanaṃ akusalañca dhammaṃ paṭicca saññojano ceva saññojanasampayutto ca akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.5:72.1.pli: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.5:73.1.pli: Nahetuyā tīṇi, naadhipatiyā nava, napurejāte nava, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke nava, navippayutte nava. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.5:75.1.pli: Saññojano ceva saññojanasampayutto ca akusalo dhammo saññojanassa ceva saññojanasampayuttassa ca akusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.5:76.1.pli: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava …pe… upanissaye āsevane nava, kamme āhāre indriye jhāne tīṇi, magge sampayutte nava …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.5:77.1.pli: Nahetuyā nava, naārammaṇe nava, naadhipatiyā nava. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.5:80.1.pli: (Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṃ, evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)

patthana3.5:81.1.pli: Saññojanavippayuttaṃ saññojaniyaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saññojanavippayutto saññojaniyo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana3.5:82.1.pli: Saññojanavippayuttaṃ asaññojaniyaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saññojanavippayutto asaññojaniyo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana3.5:83.1.pli: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe dve …pe… avigate dve. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.5:84.1.pli: (Yathā cūḷantaraduke lokiyadukasadisaṃ. Sahajātavāropi …pe… pañhāvāropi sabbattha vitthāretabbā.)

patthana3.5:85.1.pli: Saññojanavippayutto saññojaniyo akusalo dhammo saññojanavippayuttassa saññojaniyassa akusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.5:87.1.pli: Saññojanavippayuttaṃ saññojaniyaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saññojanavippayutto saññojaniyo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana3.5:88.1.pli: Saññojanavippayuttaṃ asaññojaniyaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saññojanavippayutto asaññojaniyo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Saññojanavippayuttaṃ asaññojaniyaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saññojanavippayutto saññojaniyo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Saññojanavippayuttaṃ asaññojaniyaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saññojanavippayutto saññojaniyo abyākato ca saññojanavippayutto asaññojaniyo abyākato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.

patthana3.5:89.1.pli: Saññojanavippayuttaṃ saññojaniyaṃ abyākatañca saññojanavippayuttaṃ asaññojaniyaṃ abyākatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca saññojanavippayutto saññojaniyo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.5:90.1.pli: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… āsevane ekaṃ, kamme pañca, vipāke pañca …pe… avigate pañca. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.5:91.1.pli: Nahetuyā ekaṃ, naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā dve, napurejāte cattāri, napacchājāte pañca, naāsevane pañca, nakamme ekaṃ, navipāke ekaṃ, navippayutte dve …pe… novigate tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.5:93.1.pli: Saññojanavippayutto saññojaniyo abyākato dhammo saññojanavippayuttassa saññojaniyassa abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.5:94.1.pli: Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā cattāri, anantare cattāri …pe… sahajāte pañca, aññamaññe dve, nissaye satta, upanissaye cattāri, purejāte pacchājāte dve, āsevane ekaṃ, kamme …pe… magge cattāri, sampayutte dve, vippayutte tīṇi …pe… avigate satta. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.5:98.1.pli: (Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṃ, evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)
